copy.title: Pattern Placement
copy.instruction1: Complete the puzzle by placing pieces into the correct spot in the pattern.
copy.instruction2: The faster you complete the puzzle the higher your score will be!
copy.instruction3: If you get stuck, press the hint button for some help.
copy.quit_confirm_question: Are you sure you want to give up?
copy.title: Tailoring
copy.subtitle: Pattern Placement
copy.place_correct_Bobbin_3: Snip my thread, you're good at this!
copy.place_correct_Mendy_3: We have a real eye for pattern placement!
copy.place_wrong_Mendy_1: Close but not quite. Let's try again!
copy.place_wrong_Bobbin_2: I know ya can figure out where that goes!
copy.place_wrong_Mendy_2: Let's look carefully. Where could that piece go?
copy.place_wrong_Mendy_3: Just think of it as a puzzle.
copy.place_wrong_Bobbin_4: Are ya really sure that looks right?
copy.place_wrong_Mendy_4: Hmmm... Let's think about that one again.
copy.timer_start_Bobbin_1: Get ready, here come the pieces!
copy.timer_start_Bobbin_2: Time to put it all together!
copy.timer_start_Mendy_2: It's time to assemble our pattern!
copy.hint_Mendy_1: Here's a bit of a hint.
copy.next_level_Bobbin_1: Don't stop now! Ya got more to do!
copy.next_level_Mendy_1: We have no time to waste, my dear. On to the next pattern!
copy.last_level_Mendy_1: This is the final pattern. Let us finish in style!
copy.end_poor_Bobbin_1: Um-hmm-well, good try! I betcha you'll place the pattern better next time!
copy.end_poor_Mendy_1: Let's continue, shall we? We'll place that pattern better next time I'm sure, my dear.
copy.end_poor_Bobbin_2: Keep trying! You'll get better at pattern placement, I know ya will!
copy.end_poor_Mendy_2: We tried our best, didn't we, my dear? And remember, we can always try pattern placement again!
copy.end_poor_Bobbin_3: Keep thinking happy thoughts! I know ya can place your pattern better next time!
copy.end_poor_Mendy_3: Let's not lose heart. Each pattern gets easier with practice, my dear, truly it does.
copy.end_poor_Bobbin_4: All it takes is a teensy bit more practice, and then you'll place this pattern perfectly!
copy.end_poor_Mendy_4: This pattern can be a real challenge. There's always next time to do better, my dear!
copy.end_good_Bobbin_1: Nice job! Have ya done this pattern before?
copy.end_good_Mendy_1: Not bad pattern placement, my dear, not bad at all!
copy.end_good_Bobbin_2: Hey-oh! Nice placement! Ya made me proud!
copy.end_good_Mendy_2: Our pattern placement skills are improving, my dear. Well done!
copy.end_good_Bobbin_3: Well, sleeves and stitches, you're good with this pattern placement stuff!
copy.end_good_Mendy_3: Mmm, we certainly have quite a knack for these patterns, don't we?
copy.end_good_Bobbin_4: Ya know, you're awful good with those pattern pieces!
copy.end_good_Mendy_4: Splendid job, my dear. We're on our way to perfecting this pattern!
copy.end_great_Bobbin_1: Wow-wee! Ya sure you're not a pattern-talent?
copy.end_great_Mendy_1: It looks as if we have quite a touch for pattern placement!
copy.end_great_Bobbin_2: I'd call that a pretty pattern-tastic job! Ya did great!
copy.end_great_Mendy_2: We're quite impressed! Quite impressed indeed.
copy.end_great_Bobbin_3: You've been practicing, haven't ya? I knew it! Great job!
copy.end_great_Mendy_3: We feel so proud. This is quite splendid work!
copy.end_great_Bobbin_4: What thimble-rific work! I'm not sure I could have done better myself!
copy.end_great_Mendy_4: We've been practicing our patterns, haven't we? Lovely work!
copy.end_awesome_Bobbin_1: Okay, I mean it - you're sure you're not a tailor-talent?
copy.end_awesome_Mendy_1: My dear, what utterly amazing pattern placement skills we have!
copy.end_awesome_Bobbin_2: Ya sure finished that pattern in a flit! Great job!
copy.end_awesome_Mendy_2: This just goes to show that practice does make perfect, doesn't it?
copy.end_awesome_Bobbin_3: I think you're a pattern placement master!
copy.end_awesome_Mendy_3: Truly astounding, my dear! We couldn't have placed that pattern better!
copy.end_awesome_Bobbin_4: Pleat my wings, you're a pattern placement wonder!
copy.end_awesome_Mendy_4: We simply adore your work! Superb job!
